greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of set partitions of [n] with maximal block length multiplicity equal to k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
comment: At least one block length occurs exactly k times, and all block lengths occur at most k times.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
mathematica: multinomial[n_, k_List] := n!/Times @@ (k!); b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[multinomial[n, Join[{n-i*j}, Array[i&, j]]] * b[n - i*j, i - 1, k]/j!, {j, 0, Min[k, n/i]}]]]; T[n_, k_] := b[n, n, k] - If[k == 0, 0, b[n, n, k - 1]]; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 06 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 07 2016
